title: Trump Administration Border and Immigration Enforcement
description: Multiple incidents and policy actions related to border security, immigration enforcement, and federal-local cooperation under the Trump administration
arc: This storyline encompasses various border and immigration-related incidents including a Pentagon drone shootdown in Texas airspace, federal prosecution of smuggling cases, and diplomatic negotiations between NYC officials and the Trump administration regarding ICE detainees. These events collectively illustrate the administration's approach to border security and immigration enforcement.
